## Query.countDocuments() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Returns the documents count that matches the search query

**Signature:**

```typescript
countDocuments(query?: CountDocumentsSearchKey, options?: QueryCountDocumentsOptions): this;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

query


</td><td>

CountDocumentsSearchKey


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Search query


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[QueryCountDocumentsOptions](./iodm-query.querycountdocumentsoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Query options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this


## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
const count = await query.countDocuments(
 query,
 options
);
```
